GUK1酶在肺癌代谢和生长中起着至关重要的作用肺癌是癌症特别具有挑战性的形式。它通常会出乎意料而积极地袭击，几乎没有警告，并且可以以不可预测的方式进行逃避治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/GUK1-ENZYME-PLAYS-COUCIAL-ROLE-IN-LUNG-CANCER-CANCER--CANCER-METEBOLIMS---METEBOLISM---GROWTH.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/GUK1-ENZYME-PLAYS-COUCIAL-ROLE-ROLE-IN-LUNG-CANCER-CANCER-METEBOLIMS-METEBOLISM---GROWTH.ASPX#COMMENT https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4997bf64-9d18-446e-ad0d-dd-2a68996e77777d1 Mon, 10 Feb 2025 20:18:43 -0500 GUK1 enzyme plays crucial role in lung cancer metabolism and growth
花生过敏的孩子逐渐摄入花生酱饮食逐渐增加了大约18个月的商店购买的花生酱剂量，使100％的花生过敏的儿童最初可以忍受至少一半花生的食物，以消耗三汤匙花生，而无需过敏反应，研究人员报告。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/children-with-peanut-allergy-allergy-achieve-achieve-tolerance-with------------------ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/children-with-peanut-allergy-allergy-achieve-achieve-tolerance-with-------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id= efee90cd-a7c5-4245-4245-867b-4fe311E3A6B2 Mon, 10 Feb 2025 20:13:04 -0500 Children with peanut allergy achieve tolerance with gradual peanut butter ingestion
tick传播脑炎在英国出现：专家敦促保持警惕tick传播的脑炎病毒（TBEV）现已在英国当地获得的人类病例中得到证实，并有证据表明英国tick人口已建立传播。监视的提高和临床医生的意识对于检测和管理这一新兴威胁至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/tick-borne-encephalitis-emerges-in-britain-britain-experts-experts-urge-vigilance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/tick-borne-encephalitis-emerges-in-britain-britain-experts-experts-urge-vigilance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A02DD485-3B28-40D1-81F8-A4957473D0A9 Mon, 10 Feb 2025 20:11:00 -0500 Tick-borne encephalitis emerges in Britain: Experts urge vigilance

AI与营养师：Chatgpt可以准确评估您的饭菜吗？研究人员评估了Chatgpt-4在估算餐图像中养分含量方面的准确性，并发现虽然它正确鉴定出食物，但它低估了份量和大多数养分，尤其是在大餐中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/ai-vs-dietitians-can-chatgpt-accuratery-sassess-your-meals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/ai-vs-dietitians-can-chatgpt-accuratery-assess-your-meals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe65D35C-2BD5-4526-BDB4-7FE3087428AE Mon, 10 Feb 2025 19:52:00 -0500 AI vs. dietitians: Can ChatGPT accurately assess your meals?
